titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that "Sugar" Ray Robinson should be recognized for his athletic achievements and commitment to young people.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight

bill.summary: 5/1/1997--Introduced. Declares that Sugar Ray Robinson should be recognized as one of history's greatest professional fighters.
